summary: Integration tests are experiencing flakiness related to shutdown ordering in the Core component. The issue was identified and fixed in Core's shutdown sequencing logic.
userImpact: Tests fail intermittently due to shutdown ordering issues, reducing test reliability and developer confidence in the test suite.
rootCause: Problem with shutdown ordering in Core component causing race conditions during test execution
resolutionDetails: Fixed by correcting shutdown ordering in Core component
keyQuote: Pretty sure I fixed this actually. It was a problem with shutdown ordering in Core.
